pageContent: Objective: Prostate cancer is the most common type of male cancer in the United States and the negative effect of prostate cancer treatment on sexual function has been well documented. The objective of this study was to examine the long-term impact of sexual dysfunction on spouses or partners of prostate cancer survivors.

metaData.source:
Tramadol improves patients' tolerance of transrectal ultrasound-guided prostate biopsy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/17382151/
